subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han simp|𦩎|f=舟|t=月|f2=灷|t2=关}}, corruption of an {{Han compound|舟|t1=boat|丨|t2=item|廾|t3=two hands|ls=ic|nocap=1}}, seen in the oracle bone script and bronze inscriptions, originally meaning “to mend a boat”. It was later borrowed to be used as a first-person pronoun.

subSections.title: Definitions
